attributes.action: Allow regular GPs to prescribe medicinal cannabis in all forms for any condition
attributes.additional_details:
Help people with chronic pain, sufferers of neurological issues and more with a better medicinal marijuana law. 
 
I'm not going to preach about legalising it for recreational use, I just ask for the government to consider making medicinal marijuana more acquirable for those who could benefit from it.
 
WHO has recommended rescheduling cannabis to allow medical applications: https://www.bmj.com/content/364/bmj.l574
attributes.background: In America and other countries, medicinal cannabis has been shown to improve many conditions. It's next to impossible to get a prescription here in the UK for the worst conditions. Let's change that and also open the door for all treatable conditions.
